SELECT p.product_num AS productNum , p.ptn_num AS ptnNum , (SELECT ptn_name FROM partner ptn WHERE ptn.ptn_num = p.ptn_num) AS ptnName , p.product_name AS productName , p.product_price AS productPrice FROM product AS p

SELECT product_num AS productNum , ptn_num AS ptnNum , (SELECT ptn_name FROM partner p WHERE p.ptn_num = pd.ptn_num) AS ptnName , product_name AS productName , product_price AS productPrice FROM product AS pd WHERE product_num = #{ productNum }

SELECT epl_num AS eplNum , member_id AS memberId , email AS email , (SELECT COUNT(epl_num) FROM (SELECT pl.epl_num FROM plan AS pl INNER JOIN product AS pd ON pl.product_num = pd.product_num GROUP BY pl.epl_num, pl.due_date, pd.ptn_num ) AS grp WHERE grp.epl_num = e.epl_num ) AS undertaken , dept_num AS deptNum FROM employee AS e
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan(epl_num, product_num, quantity, due_date) VALUE (#{ eplNum }, #{ productNum }, #{ quantity }, #{ dueDate })
